title: Manage Lost and Found Inventory
description: An operations manager needs to process items that have been in lost and found for more than 30 days.

tasks.description: Generate a report of all items that have been in the lost and found database for over 30 days.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a list of unclaimed items.

tasks.description: For items of value (e.g., electronics, jewelry), transfer them to the local police department as required by policy.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent prepares the valuable items for police transfer and documents it.

tasks.description: For items of no value (e.g., clothing), package them for donation to a local charity.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent prepares the non-valuable items for donation.

tasks.description: Update the status of all processed items to 'Disposed' in the database.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clears out the old records from the system.
